name: Arcane Chaos
description:
Immerse yourself in Arcane Chaos, the ultimate magic-fueled roguelike. Take on the mantle of a formidable sorceress, mastering chaotic spells to vanquish waves of foes. Level up, enhance your powers, and experiment with fusing spells to unlock a myriad of potent combinations. Can you navigate the relentless chaos and emerge victorious?

Learn and level up various basic magic spells.


Harness the chaotic energy of your defeated foes to fuse any two basic spells into 1 of 45 unique and powerful Fusion Spells.


And simply enjoy the chaotic arcane powers at your fingertips!
